fields.name: DT_Additional_List_Field_Settings_Intro
fields.fieldText: Select how this filter should be displayed - as checkboxes, radio buttons, a picklist, or a multi-select picklist.

fields.name: DT_Additional_Range_Field_Settings_Intro
fields.fieldText: Enter the minimum and maximum values for the range / slider.

fields.name: DT_Create_Deployment_Error
fields.fieldText:
There was an error creating the deployment record.


Was the Deployment Name unique?

fields.name: DT_CreateEdit_Filter_Intro
fields.fieldText: Enter the details about the filter:

value.stringValue: Select the field that you wish to use as a filter
Select the Lookup field on the Record Attribute object that references the target object.

fields.name: Deployment_Information
fields.fieldText:
Object:

{!DeploymentRecord.Object_API_Name__c}

(Object name can't be changed for an existing Deployment)


If you wish to delete this deployment and all the configured filters, then select the Toggle below and click Save. This can't be undone.

fields.name: DT_Filters_Intro
fields.fieldText: Create a new filter for your deployment, or edit your existing filters:

fields.name: DT_Filters_Footer
fields.fieldText: Once you're done editing, you can close this tab or navigate away from this page.

fields.name: DT_New_Deployment_Intro
fields.fieldText: Enter the required details for your new deployment:

fields.name: DT_Warning_Text
fields.fieldText: The Deployment Name must be unique or there will be an error.

fields.name: DT_Intro
fields.fieldText: Use this configurator to create a new Dynacat filters deployment, or to modify an existing one.

fields.name: DT_Select_Deployment_Intro
fields.fieldText: Select from your existing deployments or create a new one:
